transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello, good evening.
Executive: Good afternoon sir. Good afternoon sir, Shubham baat kar raha hu Cinema India Mart se. Kal aap se baat ki ho paayi thi sir.
Customer: Good evening sir.
Executive: Sir I don't know Hindi sir, tell me sir.
Customer: Okay, you tell me sir. What is your concern sir? You asked now that you have given not satisfied to the call. So what is your concern?
Customer: Sir that thing that is right now not time sir. You able to speak. I am in outside in home. Okay. So you can call me after two days morning 10 to 11 that time I will answer you in front of my system. Okay sir.
Executive: Okay after after two days I will call you hai na. Till then we are closing your till then we are closing your ticket. Okay sir we are setting the reminder for that. Okay.
Customer: Thank you sir.
Executive: Okay please give a positive feedback on that hai na.
Customer: Thank you sir. Thank you.
Executive: Sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer gave a not satisfied rating to call.

- Customer is currently outside and unable to speak.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to call after two days.

- Executive will close the ticket and set a reminder.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call after two days.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- feedback, call, reminder
